tool.name: Slice
tool.command:
ln -s "${input_bam}" temp_input.bam && ln -s "${input_bam.metadata.bam_index}" temp_input.bam.bai &&
#if str($slice_method.slice_method_selector) == "bed":
samtools view -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -b -L "${input_interval}" -o unsorted_output.bam temp_input.bam &&
#elif str($slice_method.slice_method_selector) == "chr":
samtools view -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -b -o unsorted_output.bam temp_input.bam ${ ' '.join( map( lambda x:'"%s"' % ( x ), str( $slice_method.refs ).split(",") ) ) } &&
#elif str($slice_method.slice_method_selector) == "man":
samtools view -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -b -o unsorted_output.bam temp_input.bam
#for $region in $slice_method.regions: "${region.chrom}:${region.start}-${region.end}" #end for
&&
#end if
samtools sort -O bam -T sorted -@ \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} -o "${output_bam}" unsorted_output.bam

param.name: slice_method_selector
param.label: How do you want to slice your dataset?
param.option: using a list of intervals from a BED dataset
by chromosomes/contigs present in the BAM dataset

param.label: BED file
param.name: input_interval
param.help: BED datasets can be obtained using "Get Data -> UCSC Main" datasource.

param.name: refs
param.label: Select references you would like to restrict bam to
param.help: Click and type in the box above to see options. You can select multiple entries. Numbers show the length of chromosome/contig in bp.

param.name: chrom
param.label: Select references you would like to restrict bam to
param.help: Select chromosome/contig from the list. Numbers show the length of chromosome/contig in bp.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Allow to restrict input BAM dataset to a list of intervals defined in a BED file, individual chromosomes, and coordinates. BED datasets can be obtained from **Get Data -> UCSC Main**.
This tool is based on ``samtools view`` command.
